00014 long SR04::Distance() {
00015     long d = 0;
00016     _duration = 0;
00017     digitalWrite(_triggerPin, LOW);
00018     delayMicroseconds(2);
00019     digitalWrite(_triggerPin, HIGH);
00020     delayMicroseconds(10);
00021     digitalWrite(_triggerPin, LOW);
00022     delayMicroseconds(2);
00023     _duration = pulseIn(_echoPin, HIGH, PULSE_TIMEOUT);
00024     d = MicrosecondsToCentimeter(_duration);
00025     delay(25);
00026     return d;
00027 }

00029 long SR04::DistanceAvg(int wait, int count) {
00030     long min, max, avg, d;
00031     min = 999;
00032     max = 0;
00033     avg = d = 0;
00034 
00035     if (wait < 25) {
00036         wait = 25;
00037     }
00038 
00039     if (count < 1) {
00040         count = 1;
00041     }
00042 
00043     for (int x = 0; x < count + 2; x++) {
00044         d = Distance();
00045 
00046         if (d < min) {
00047             min = d;
00048         }
00049 
00050         if (d > max) {
00051             max = d;
00052         }
00053 
00054         avg += d;
00055     }
00056 
00057     // substract highest and lowest value
00058     avg -= (max + min);
00059     // calculate average
00060     avg /= count;
00061     return avg;
00062 }

00065     _distance = Distance();

00072 long SR04::MicrosecondsToCentimeter(long duration) {
00073     long d = (duration * 100) / 5882;
00074     //d = (d == 0)?999:d;
00075     return d;
00076 }
